task.en: Please help me do the following things in iMovie: create a new trailer project using a 45s template. Then, quit to the project gallery view. If prompted, name the project as "ActionTemplate".
task.zh: 请帮我在iMovie剪辑中完成这些操作：创建一个trailer项目，选择一个45秒的模板。进入project后，直接退出回到显示项目列表的界面。如果要求输入保存名，就输入ActionTemplate。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/
